channel.title: DIY on Bits & pieces - Sven Wehrend
channel.description: Recent content in DIY on Bits & pieces - Sven Wehrend

item.title: Build your own synthesizer modules
item.description: Introduction Hi, today I want to share with you the basic knowledge of DIYing your own synthesizer modules - those do not need of the eurorack standard although in my case they are. If you get started with eurorack format or any other modular like synth standard, but especially the eurorack standard - you will be most likely overwhelmed about the sheer number of manufacturers and available. You can have a simple look here on ModularGrid.
